description:
Hozuki is pestered by a scoop seeking feline journalist and finds himself sitting next to a peach idol on the train. Later, the right hand man from the European Hell pays Hozuki a visit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hell Idol: Peach Maki / The Right Arm Blues
Jigoku Idol Peach Maki / Migiude no Blues
Peach Maki, idole des Enfers - Le blues du bras droit
地獄アイドル ピーチ・マキ / 右腕のブルース
